pages.text: Indeed He Who ordained the Quran for you, will bring you back to the place of return. Say, “My Lord knows best who it is who brings true guidance, and who is in manifest error.”
And you were not expecting that the Book would be sent to you, except as a mercy from your Lord. Thus do not be a support to the rejecters
And let nothing keep you back from the signs of God after they have been revealed to you, and invite the people to your Lord, and be not of the company of those who join gods with God
And call not on another god, besides God. There is no god but He. Everything that exists will perish, except His Face. To Him belongs the command, and to Him will you all be brought back
Do the people think that they will be left alone by saying, “We believe,” and not be tested
We tested those before them, and God will certainly make known those who are truthful from those who are liars
Do those who do wrong think that they will get the better of Us? Poor is their judgment
For those whose hopes are in the meeting with God in the hereafter, let them strive, for the term appointed by God is surely coming and He hears and knows all things
And if any strive, they do so for their own souls, for God is free of all needs from all creation
